resources.string: Error while downloading from server. Please make sure that you have a stable internet connection, and that your SD card is inserted and has free space!

ROM Manager is not responsible for any damage that you may cause to your phone. By rooting your phone, you have already voided your warranty. Playing around in non-userspace is dangerous. In addition, ROM Manager may send anonymous usage statistics to Google Analytics to help improve the application. Press OK to agree. Press Cancel to exit the application.
Your ROM is not set up to receive OTA Updates. Please contact the ROM developer!

The ROM you are using does not support OTA Updates. The developer of this ROM needs to make the appropriate changes so their ROM support OTA update. Please contact the ROM developer! Please DO NOT contact ROM Manager: THIS IS NOT A ROM MANAGER BUG.
Fix file system permissions. This often fixes Force Close problems.
Done! You should now reboot your phone.
Upgrade to ROM Manager (Premium) to access the full list of ROMs!
This feature is only available to Premium users!
There is no update available for your ROM.
Press OK to update your ROM to the latest version: %s.
There is an update available for ClockworkMod Recovery.
You must upgrade your ROM Manager to the latest version!
There is a new version of ClockworkMod recovery available. You must update before can use ROM Manager!
There was an error renaming your backup. Please choose a unique and valid filename for your backup.
There was an error deleting your backup.
Partition your SD Card to enable installation of applications on your SD for supported ROMs.
Partitioning your SD Card will wipe ALL the data on your card. Are you sure you want to reboot and continue?
There are no ROMs available for your phone yet! Ask your favorite developers to get listed on ROM Manager for free!
Your download cache has been cleared.
Error occurred while downloading the Developer list.
Error occurred while processing the Developer list!
Error occurred while downloading the ROM list! Please contact the developer of this ROM.
Error occurred while processing the ROM list!
Error occurred while processing this ROM!
Error occurred while downloading this ROM!
Are you sure you want to reboot your phone and restore your backup?
Boot into Recovery mode for manual management.
Are you sure you want to reboot into ClockworkMod Recovery?
Are you sure you want to reboot into %s?
Press OK to reboot into ClockworkMod Recovery and continue the installation.
An error occurred while flashing your recovery.
An error occurred while downloading your recovery.
Having problems flashing the recovery using ROM Manager? Press OK if you have flashed ClockworkMod Recovery manually.
You must have the ClockworkMod Recovery installed to flash and restore ROMs!
You must have ClockworkMod Recovery installed before continuing! Install the recovery through ROM Manager first.
Caching downloads makes your ROM installations much faster. Are you sure you want to clear your download cache?
Are you sure you want to reboot your phone and backup your ROM?
An error occurred while attempting to run privileged commands!
Please choose a unique and valid filename for your backup.
Are you sure you want to flash an alternate recovery? ROM Manager features will be made unavailable until you flash back to ClockworkMod Recovery.
Flash older and experimental versions of ClockworkMod Recovery.
No legacy recoveries found. Are you connected to the internet?"

Advanced Mode is not meant for all users. Advanced mode will get you access to the latest recoveries, experimental ROMs, and other various unstable, but bleeding edge features. Advanced mode should be used with caution and is only recommended for users comfortable with ADB.
This is available once you enable Advanced Mode from the ROM Manager Main menu.
The Premium version of ROM Manager is required to download this Developer\'s ROMs!
The SD Card needs to be mounted to use ROM Manager!
The next Automatic Backup will take place on %s.
You must root your phone for ROM Manager to function. Superuser was not found at \"/system/bin/su\" or \"/system/xbin/su\". Use Google Search on your computer to find instructions to root your phone.
Your ROM Manager License is outdated. Please reinstall ROM Manager via the Market.

Gone are the days of downloading a ROM and pushing it to your phone: Introducing Web Connect! If you are browsing a forum on your computer, and the developer supports it, you can download the ROM straight to ROM Manager! Set it up in the ROM Manager Menu. See koushikdutta.com for a demo.
Take a picture to install a ROM. Requires the free Barcode Scanner application.
You need the Premium version of ROM Manager to install ROMs from QR Codes!
You must have Barcode Scanner installed to use this feature! Press OK to install free Barcode scanner application from the Market.
Are you sure you wish to replace your recovery?

Google Analytics will send anonymous usage statistics to help make ROM Manager a better app! By pressing OK, you state that you understand that anonymous usage information will be sent to Google and the developers of ROM Manager.
Google Analytics is on. Thanks for helping make ROM Manager a better app!
Google Analytics is off. You should turn this on!
Progress bars in Backup and Restore are disabled for speed.
Progress bars in Backup and Restore are enabled. Disable for quicker backup and restores.
Recovery will be erased prior to flashing.
Recovery will not be erased prior to flashing.
An error occurred while in recovery mode. Would you like to report it? Please do not report the same error multiple times!
ROM Manager is unable to open this file. Please remove any spaces from your file and folder path. Or run it manually via ClockworkMod recovery.
This does not seem to be a valid backup. The MD5 file is missing.
Help support ROM Manager! (Changes require application restart.)

There are several ways to fix a "broken""" recovery:
1) Flash an alternate or older recovery and then flash back to the current version.
2) Try enabling "Erase Recovery" in ROM Manager's Settings.
3) Try clearing the download cache via the menu and reflashing.
4) Flash back to an older recovery.
5) Fastboot or SBF a recovery onto your phone from your PC.
Some ROMs have a broken "reboot" binary. View this thread on your computer for more information: http://bit.ly/dj9qbN.
Please feel free to email me at koush@clockworkmod.com with your bug!
Unable to contact License Server! Please use the Android Market instead!
Rebooting into Clockwork Recovery seems to have failed. This problem may be fixable by clearing the download cache and reflashing recovery. Press OK to clear the download cache and reflash recovery.
An error occurred while trying to set up your web connect account.
You can now download ROMs straight to your phones if the ROM thread supports it.
A ROM download is currently in progress. Cancel download?
PayPal purchases are not supported on this device!
Your download has started...\nYou can view its progress in the notification area!
Flashing an update package on a recovery other than ClockworkMod Recovery may not work properly. Proceed?

Only Premium users may use Alternate recoveries with ROM Manager to flash ROMs! Otherwise, you must have ClockworkMod Recovery installed before continuing! Install the recovery through ROM Manager first.
You have now activated ROM Manager Premium via PayPal! No further downloads are necessary, even if you wipe your device. Your purchase has been noted on ROM Manager\'s servers.
